Kisame uses a nearby water supply to create a giant water vortex around his [[Samehada]]. Kisame wields the vortex as a weapon and then jumps above his opponent and uses his sword to smash the vortex into his targets causing massive damage.

[[es:Elemento Agua: Jutsu del Gran Remolino Envolvente]]
[[pl:Suiton: Ōuzu Matoi no Jutsu]]
